mapper.update:
update house_info
build_id = #{buildId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_code = #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_nature = #{houseNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_area = #{houseArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
lake_house_id = #{lakeHouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update house_info set build_id = #{buildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_code = #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_nature = #{houseNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_area = #{houseArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, lake_house_id = #{lakeHouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select build_id buildId, house_code houseCode, house_nature houseNature, house_area houseArea, lake_house_id lakeHouseId from house_info

update.foreach: update house_info set build_id = #{item.buildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_code = #{item.houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_nature = #{item.houseNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_area = #{item.houseArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, contacts = #{item.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{item.telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{item.startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{item.endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, lake_house_id = #{item.lakeHouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where house_id = #{item.houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
